info.name: Add Sample Establishments
info.description: Collection to add sample establishments to the booking system

body.raw:
{
  "ownerId": "1",
  "name": "Hotel Continental Saigon",
  "type": "HOTEL",
  "city": "Ho Chi Minh",
  "address": "132-134 Dong Khoi, District 1, HCMC",
  "priceRangeVnd": 2500000,
  "starRating": 5,
  "descriptionLong": "Hotel Continental Saigon is one of the most historic and luxurious hotels in Saigon. Located in the center of District 1, the hotel offers a first-class accommodation experience with professional service and modern amenities. From here, guests can easily explore famous attractions such as the City Theater, Central Post Office and bustling shopping centers.",
  "amenitiesList": [
    "Free WiFi",
    "Outdoor pool",
    "Spa & Wellness",
    "Gym",
    "Fine dining restaurant",
    "Bar & Lounge",
    "24/7 room service",
    "Parking",
    "Conference center",
    "Concierge service"
  ],
  "hasInventory": true,
  "isAvailable": true
}
